inclusion.criterion: low muscle mass as evidenced by serum creatinine < 8 mg/dL in the presence of anuria (urine output < 200 ml/d) and adequate dialysis (Urea Reduction Ratio > 65%)
inclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 3-day-old female infant with jaundice that started one day ago. She was born at 34w of gestation and kept in an incubator due to her gestational age.
